com.gemplus.opencard.terminal
Class GemplusCardTerminalFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.gemplus.opencard.terminal.GemplusCardTerminalFactory
public class GemplusCardTerminalFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminalFactory

CardTerminalFactory for Gemplus card terminals. Supported terminals types are GemCore-based readers (GCR410,GCR700 and E-PAD) and Oros-based readers (GCR400, GCI400 and GCR500).

Terminal specific informations are stored in a String array.

  • The first element is always the friendly name of the reader
  • Second element declares the type of the reader hardware (for example GCR410)
  • In case of GCR410 (GemCore) the third parameter declares the device used for communication (e.g., COM1, COM2, SERIALA, SERIALB, ...)

See Also:
CardTerminalFactory
